places_with_reviews.name: Four seasons Banquet and Resort
address: The Lalit Cafe Rd, Bajrang Colony, Balotra, Rajasthan 344022, India

reviews.text:
HAD VISITED IN MANY MARRIAGES AND
ALSO HAVE MANY PARTIES THERE GOOD RESORT FOR MARRIAGE PARTY OF 700 PEOPLE

One of the wonderful properties to visit in the nearby location of Balortra.  It has a nice and large banquet and an open garden for functions or weddings. Rooms are comfortable and washrooms are neat and clean. Makes for a good stay!
Very delicate arrangement for a destination wedding.
Overall property was good and clean.

The resort is nice for family events with big size like weddings, inauguration, parties etc. The best part is that it is situated within Balotra city so the commute becomes so easy. It has good amenities like banquet hall, rooms, swimming pool and many more.
Good  restaurants and  marriage garden 🏡
Best resort in the town

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel tulsi inn
address: Near Ist railway crossing Mahadev tower, Balotra, Rajasthan 344022, India

reviews.text:
The place is situated near the railway station so it is easy to travel. We took the basic room, it was very congested and the washroom was too small to be used. The hot water geyser was not working the bed sheets/blankets were not clean the worst bason had few spots of Pan masala which was not cleaned properly by the staff before giving us the room. We did not get any soap or towels. They do not provide any food but they provide basic tea and coffee which is made near their reception area.

If you are very tight on budget then you can go with this hotel or else you can find other hotels with much better facilities.

I can see this hotel was the cheapest among the options available but the quality can be improved.

A good and cosy place to stay in Balotra at a very low price, The location is fantastic, Rooms are nice and well maintained, Helpful staff. The railway station is just walking distance, surrounded by the busiest market, auto taxis are easily available . Must recommend to stay.
I am from Nepál and first Time visit  at balotra. I stáy at hotel tulsi balotra . and Staff and owner Dino bohaté friendly Nature. bohat Help kiya mera . Thank you.

Friendly staff and near to railway station 🚉. Food delivery at room is also available. Surly recommend 👍
Happy to stay here 🏨
Best location and hotel.nearest to railway station Balotra.highly recommended for balotra😊

places_with_reviews.name: Mansarovar Hotel
address: building No 1, Plot no 6, Khed Rd, near 2nd Railway Crossing Road, Balotra, Rajasthan 344022, India

reviews.text: I had booked this hotel for my parents for their visit to Balotra. And they faced such a bad experience from the staff. The staff didn't address our requirements. They asked 100 times for hot waters. Rooms are not cleaned, and the bedsheets didn't washed.
nice stay, I always stay at this hotel, owner narsingh ji is very cooperative and good persen

People should ask manager during check-in. Bcoz there is some technical issue with this hotel regarding payment. Today I went for check-in. They refused my check-in. They said they had not received payment from OYO, but I was booked that hotel from GOIBIBO and made payment earlier. It is recommended that hotel should resolve this issue with OYO management.
And customer should confirm about their checkin after making payment whether they received payment or not. Bcoz cancellation window will be closed during check-in day.

Mansarovar Hotel is an average place to stay in the town Balotra. The facilities and hygiene are maintained decently. You can't expect luxury stay but for regular stat it is a decent option. It is economic and pocket friendly option. There is food, grocery and market available nearby.
Good hotel, staff are good ,washrooms are new and renovated, good hotel in budget price, location in heart of balotracity

places_with_reviews.name: Moti Palace hotel , bar & restaurant
address: kshatriyo ka morcha, opp. to Kheteshwar Colony Road, Balotra, Rajasthan 344022, India

reviews.text:
This is the best bet you got in this area, a very good hotel in and around Balotra. The rooms are well kept, spacious, well ventilated. The beds, bed sheets and comforter were all clean and also smelled good.
The staff was prompt and courteous. The room service was faster than what I had expected.
This hotel has a restaurant in its building. I found the restaurant to be a bit on expensive side keeping in view the town. The food wasn’t that tasty but not disappointing.
Overall I would rate it a 4 star experience.
The owner gave me a discount on the room as I checked out about 10 hrs early.

Great food at a great price! Love the fish plates as well as the salads. restaurant that doesn't feel like a chain! Love this place!
Stopped here for a snack on our way back to Jodhpur.
Had the boneless buffalo wings and potato skins appetizer and some French onion soup. Appetizer was very good...
Food was very good and reasonably priced. Ordered a steak dinner. It was tender and well seasoned.
Moti palace Restaurants are well known in the Balotra area. Reasonably priced good food and drink. Lots of bar and dining room seating, with plenty of flat screen TV's to give...
The menu offers a wide variety of mouth-watering starters. I had the white asparagus accompanied by a mousseline sauce and poached eggs, while my friend tried the zucchini carpaccio served with sundries tomatoes and a mozzarella strudel. They were exquisite. The main course consisted in a risotto with scallop cooked in cream and a cassolette of coley with mussels, which really thrilled us. It all was followed by a delicious apple pie served with a scoop of vanilla ice cream for dessert.
you enter the place you are welcomed by a magnificent setting, a delightful marriage of antique cut stones and the luxuries of modernity.  Sitting in any table you have a wonderful view of the workshop-like kitchen where you can see the chefs working. For those who do not book a table and are waiting, there is a cosy lounge with aged leather armchairs and pictures of polo players displayed on the walls.
All the products were fresh and the dishes had the warmth of home-made food. The chefs takes great care in selecting the best quality ingredients. The restaurant also caters for all tastes by providing a large selection of the best wines of the region, which are pricy but worth sampling.

It's fine as far as rooms are concern in this small place. From outer look don't look sofesticate, rather looks simple. Rooms are good with all basic facilities especially for hot water, tea and coffee, slow service in restaurant, limited food option in restaurant. Lift is available and you can pay by card too. I have stayed in other available hotels in this town and found that the rooms of this hotel are better .... Yes, you have to compare with price and facilities as well.
It's ok
Restaurant & bar, high in pricing as its services.

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Neelam Inn
address: Jodhpur - Balotra Rd, opposite Nilam Cenema Hall, HOTELNEELAMINNLNN, Balotra, Rajasthan 344022, India

reviews.text:
Stayed here during a friend's wedding ceremony.
Decent place.
There was no power backup as we had to take stairs for upto three floors as the lifts were not working. The staffs were helpful and supportive.

Hotel is in a lane . good for solo traveller or budget traveller. Room is mid size OK too. with hot water 24 hrs on tap. Cleanliness is OK. Man on reception is nice guy.try not to opt when with family . you can reach hotel either from railway stn side or from collect rate circle side. Walking distance from both the side. Food is OK and prices are very genuine. You can take edibles in hotel itself. Various hotels are available nearby.
'Neelam In' hotel is nice place to stay with freindly staff. All rooms are fully furnished and well managed.

Meelam Inn Hotel is best stay .
Such a nice location and views, clean comfortable great location.
I suggest you my friends this is a great place to stay.
Good job
